About Me

Hi! My name is Elias Fuentes and I am a self-taught web developer based in Las Vegas, NV. My path towards web development is long; I was a Music major in college but opted to get a degree in Accounting. Realizing that I could not utilize my creative side, I sought for new career paths. I discovered that web development sparks both my creative and logical sides.
